targets.expr:
sum by (method, endpoint) (increase(backendai_api_request_duration_sec_sum{job="$jobs"}[5m])) 
/
sum by (method, endpoint) (increase(backendai_api_request_duration_sec_count{job="$jobs"}[5m]))

sum by (task_name, status) (increase(backendai_bgtask_processing_time_sec_sum{job="$jobs"}[5m])) 
/
sum by (task_name, status) (increase(backendai_bgtask_processing_time_sec_count{job="$jobs"}[5m]))
